thread.title: Harbor Breeze Corp Introduces its Latest Whale Watching Tours
thread.title_full: Harbor Breeze Corp Introduces its Latest Whale Watching Tours

author: prbuzz.com
title: Harbor Breeze Corp Introduces its Latest Whale Watching Tours
text:
Whale watching is a phenomenal hobby and out of Long Beach, California, people enjoy an abundance of wildlife. The number of whales that can be sighted in Long Beach/LA Harbor is impressive and, hence, many people prefer the this area over others.
Year-round, whales are spotted, including Blue Whales, Gray Whales, Fin Whales, Humpback Whales, Orcas, and Minke Whales. This enjoyable whale watching has been made possible by Harbor Breeze Cruises for approximately 20 years.
The founders of this successful company ( http://2seewhales.com ), opened up a second location this past April in the historic LA Harbor, next to the lively fish market. The new location, LA Waterfront Cruises, has had similar viewing success. Harbor Breeze Cruises and LA Waterfront Cruises’ catamarans are custom-built, with whale watching in mind. Stadium seating enhances the passengers’ visual experience.
Both locations are proud partners with the Aquarium of the Pacific, with naturalists on board every whale watch. In addition to whale watching, visitors from around the world can also enjoy a daily harbor cruises. Residents and companies enjoy hosting their dinner cruises and weddings on board as well.
To obtain more information about the cruises, visit http://2seewhales.com/
About the website
2 See Whales offers a myriad of services to all those who wish to make the most of whale watching. There are the blue ones, the gray colored mammals and the orca amongst others that have been sighted frequently. The prices are very competitive.
